EmailTemplate.description: Notification to the requestor once a Reassignment Request has been fulfilled.
EmailTemplate.name: Account Reassignment Completed Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Account Reassignment has been Completed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!User.FirstName},
An Account Reassignment that you requested is now complete.
https://c.na13.visual.force.com/apex/AccountsReassignmentsVFTab?fcf=00Ba0000009snc0
Click above link to view your Account Reassignment Requests and please defer to your manager for any questions.
